memorableMoments.message: We both met each other in the year 2023, around the first week of May.
Got to know the name of the most charming girl I ever got to witness through her notebook's Front Page, Aasmi Surya.

specialDates.message: My eyes got to see the most beautiful girl in the human kind for the very first time.
I Got to know her name from the front page of her notebook, Aasmi Surya.
